attributes.action: stop the Football Association from selling no highlight packages and marketing our national game as a commodity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why have Setanta been allowed to screen all away games without any highlight packages being allowed for free to access channels? We are outraged at this marketing of our national game in so brazen and commercial a manner. It is hard to get behind our national team when we are forced to pay to watch even highlights. We will not be signing up to any Setanta products nor purchasing any offical England merchandise until this is resloved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
